title: akā, he luakini ʻē aʻe?
paragraphs:
I kinohi, he ana.
"E malamalama," wahi a ka lama.
A i loko o ia ana, hana ke kanaka i ke akamai.
Ua pena lākou i nā holoholona a lākou e hahai ai;
Ua pena lākou i ko lākou makemake i ka wā e hiki mai ana,
ʻaʻole e hoʻonani akā e kāhea.
Hula lakou,
a lilo ke ana i heiau.

Kūkulu nā kānaka i nā heiau.
ʻO ka poʻe mai nā ʻāina like ʻole, ka poʻe ʻaʻole i hui, kūkulu i nā heiau.
Ke nana oe i ka luakini, ike oe i ke aniani,
he hōʻike no ko mākou ʻano a me ko mākou makemake e lilo.

Ua kūkulu ʻo Rationality i ka Parthenon ma Athens.
Ua kukulu ka hui ana i ke Kaaba ma Meka.
Ua kūkulu ʻo Purity i ka luakini ʻo Kashi Vishwanath ma nā Ganges.
Mālama ka hoʻomanawanui i ka Pā Komohana ma Ierusalema.
Ua kūkulu ʻo Enlightenment i ka Shwedagon Pagoda ma Yangon.
A ʻo ka hoʻomau ʻana o nā kūpuna i kūkulu i ka Candomblé terreiros ma Salvador.

ʻO nā mea a pau i loko o ka luakini he pule.
Hiki ke kiʻekiʻe e like me ka hale pule e hoʻohaʻahaʻa iā ʻoe,
ʻeleʻele e like me ka lua o ka lāʻau e nānā ai ʻoe i loko,
olohelohe e like me ka waonahele e hamau ana i ka hoonanea,
a i ʻole nani me ke gula e hoʻohiki ana i ka mana.

He mau hōʻailona nā luakini i ko mākou ʻuhane,

alakai i kahi kapu o loko,
kahi e wehe ai mākou i ka mana hana
ʻo ko mākou ʻike hohonu ʻole.

ʻO ka mea pena, e like me ke kahuna, ka sage, a i ʻole ka shaman,
 
komo i loko o kēia hale hui.
E like me kā lākou i hana ai ma ke ana,
ʻO kā lākou hana e hāʻawi i ke kino i nā waiwai,
e hāʻawi i ko lākou mau lima i ka mea makemake e hānau, e lawelawe i ka mea e pono ai.
He poʻe kauā lākou, kūkulu hale, ʻāpana a hapa.
ka mea a ke kanaka e hoike ai ma ke kino.

ʻAʻole naʻe i hana like nā ʻāpana a pau o ka luakini.
ʻO ka hapa nui loa o kekahi luakini
e mau ana kona puka.

Ua paʻa i nā puka o ka luakini ko lākou mana e ʻoki,
e huki i kahi ʻeha ma waena o ka mea hiki ke komo a me ka mea hiki ʻole.
Pela e lilo ai ka luakini i pahikaua.

A ua hoʻohana ʻia kēia pahi kaua no nā kenekulia,
kū'ē i ke kala o ka ʻili,
kahi i hānau ai,
ka poʻe i aloha nui ʻia,
nā lole a lākou e ʻaʻahu ai,
a me nā koho a lākou e hana ai me ko lākou kino iho.

ʻO nā luakini hoʻi e ʻōlelo nei e hoʻokipa i nā mea a pau
kū i loko o nā lāhui ʻaʻole.

He luakini Buddhist hamama ma Nepal
ʻaʻole hiki ke kipa ʻia e nā mea a pau e makemake ana e komo.
ʻO nā palena, nā visa, a me nā politika e hoʻoholo i ka mea hiki ke pule.
He halepule ma Kina, he hale pule ma Ierusalema,
he luakini ma Tibet,
kū nā mea a pau ma hope o nā paia i ʻike ʻole ʻia.
A i loko o ia mau pā, ʻoi aku ka ʻoi o ka pahi kaua.

ʻAʻole hiki ke hoʻokomo i ka luakini.
ʻAʻohe wahi ma ka Honua
hiki ke paʻa i ka laʻa honua.

Akā naʻe, kūkulu nā kānaka a pau i noho i nā heiau.
he mea hōʻoia i hoʻohui ʻia kekahi mea laʻa iā mākou.
He mea ʻike ʻole i nā palena.
ʻO kahi mea i kūpono i kona wahi ponoʻī.

Ma hea e hiki ai iā mākou ke kūkulu i ka luakini?
Ma kahi e hiki ole ai i na pa,
ʻaʻole hiki i ka lāhui ke koi,
ʻaʻole hiki i ka hoʻomana ke hoʻomalu.
Space.

ʻAe, he hakahaka kēia wahi.
ʻOiai inā e hoʻāʻo kekahi poʻe i kēia manawa e koi iā ia,
a ʻoiai ke hoʻomanawanui nei ka lewa i kona pilikia moʻomeheu.
kahiko kona mana i ko kakou noonoo.
ʻO ia ka palena ʻole ma luna, ka lewa, ka lani, ka lani,
nā mea maʻamau kahiko loa a mākou e kaʻana like.
Lawe ʻo Space i kahi mana kupuna
e hoohui ia kakou.

Aia paha he wahi ma waho o kēlā me kēia palena,
no nā kānaka a pau a me nā mea ola a pau,
he luakini e noʻonoʻo ai iā mākou iho he hui hoʻokahi,
alakaʻi ʻia e nā waiwai a mākou e hana nei.
He kono kēia i kekahi ʻano kuʻuna hou.

He kono noʻeau e hana i ka luakini ma ke ākea,
kahi luakini i kūkulu ʻia i kahi hiki ʻole i nā pā.

E noʻonoʻo i kahi ola e hoʻomanaʻo ʻia.
Kākau i ka inoa ma aneʻi.

A paʻa mākou.
Ke kulike ka luakini Orbital me ko kakou mau antenna ma ka Honua,
e ala ka inoa.
Na ka satellite e mālama iā ia i kona hoʻomanaʻo
a hoʻouna i kahi leka iā ʻoe:
"I keia la, i keia hora, ua pii ka inoa au i hoouna mai ai, a aia no."

He hana noʻeau ka Orbital Temple,
a me kahi ukali.
A ʻoiai he "temple" kona inoa.
lilo ia i heiau ina wale no
hoʻoholo ʻoe e ʻike iā ia he hoʻokahi.

Aia i kēia manawa ma ke ʻano he evocation,
e like me ka mea i hana ʻia e nā mea pena
i loko o ia ana mua.

Aia nō mākou i loko o ke ana,
ka pouli nui o ka lewa,
kahi o ka honua ka lama,
ʻo kahi wale nō a mākou i ʻike ai
aia ka ike.

Ke hana nei ka mea pena,
Ke hula nei na kanaka,
e lawelawe ana i ka manao like me ko kakou mau kupuna,
kiʻi, kiʻi kiʻi, hoʻolālā i kā mākou makemake i ka wā e hiki mai ana,
ʻaʻole e hoʻonani akā e kāhea aku,
no laila hiki ke hānau ʻia kahi luakini hou.

A ʻae,
kono ʻia ʻoe e hula.
